text: Acciona, S. A. is a Spanish company for the promotion and management of infrastructures (water, concessions, constructions and services) and renewable energies. It has a presence in 65 countries on five continents. The company founded in 1862 in Galicia. At the beginning of 2018, Transmediterr√°nea would finally be sold to the Canarian company Naviera Armas. In January 2018 Acciona signed a EUR 100 million loan with the European Investment Bank. == References == Category:Companies of Spain Category:1862 establishments in Europe Category:19th-century establishments in Spain
title: Acciona
